description: seated man smoking cigarette; large stove with six-tiered openings between firebox and chimney
signed: on sheet below image right in black: [BRASSAI]
text: Brassaï’s photograph of the famous Spanish artist Pablo Picasso, places Picasso in a foreboding shadow of a stove. The photograph also implies a relationship between Brassaï and Picasso in his comfort in sitting for the camera, as his expression seems relaxed. Picasso’s eyes look away from the camera, as if in conversation, and he might be gesturing with his hand.
title: Tirage de l'Auter, Picasso
